DASHBOARD.hero-card-standard-desc: Start creating with the free version of Melon Editor
DASHBOARD.hero-card-plus-desc: More functionality and resources to power for your Melon Editor projects
DASHBOARD.hero-card-pro-desc: A complete solutions for all you need to make a game with Melon Editor

COMPARATION.title: Feature Comparation
COMPARATION.1.1: Export/import a whole project in the form of .meprj
COMPARATION.1.2: Export/import some files in the form of .mebdl
COMPARATION.1.3: Export the build project for browser
COMPARATION.1.4: Export the build projectto melon gaming server (hosted)
COMPARATION.1.5: Export the build project for FB instant games version
COMPARATION.1.6: Export the build project for Native ios/Android deployment
COMPARATION.1.7: Export the build project for Native Desktop deployment
COMPARATION.1.8: Upload games directly to FB instant games
COMPARATION.2.1: Social Features (game sharing, game request, game bot)
COMPARATION.3.3: Ads based monetization on Facebook Instant Games
COMPARATION.4.6: Increases Limit Sell Asset Size MB/GB

PAYMENT.payment-until: You will be upgraded to PLUS, until:
